text:
Dr. Phil re: #coronavirus:

"People die in USA:

45K - auto accidents (Prevent: Don't drive)

480K - cigarettes (Prevent: Don't smoke)

360K - swimming pools (Prevent: Don't swim)

#COVIDー19 (Too Late: Mitigation)

Dr. Phil Advice (Prevent: Turn TV OFF!)

https://t.co/Rh6tvvrQit

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Dr. Phil
entity.description: Dr. Phillip C. McGraw's show draws on his 25 years of experience in psychology, sociology and observation. Beginning his TV career as the resident expert on human behavior on Oprah Winfrey's daily talk show, Dr. Phil continues to deal with real issues in his blunt style.
